name: Our Earth Your Choice
description:
One to One Development Trust is a registered charity (Charity number: 1105935) using creativity and technology to increase learning and aspiration in communities.

Any donations that we receive will be invested into developing Our Earth Your Choice further and offering more opportunities to young people interested in the games/creative industries. Comments welcome! Please use #OurEarthYourChoice. Thank you!

Our Earth Your Choice was part funded by Creative Wakefield.

RESOURCES

Get links to climate-change related resources and find out more about how the project evolved at ourearthyourchoice.co.uk
